CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1962, pg. A3, reads: "Easter Worshippers Add Frills to Faith - Holy Cross - The capacity crowd retiring from the Church of the Holy Cross, after Easter Sunday morning services, included many family units like these, prettily attired in frills, furs, flowers or worsted woolens. A tiny lad demands a hoist in daddy's arms, to get a better look at the girls. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Women, men, and children exiting Holy Cross Church, after Easter services
